pr_title: fix on changeServiceForVirtualMachine when updating read/write rate

timeline.message:
fix for changeServiceForVirtualMachnie

When changing the service offering of a VM the disk_offering_id is not
updated in volumes DB table and VM could not start

timeline.author: sureshanaparti

timeline.bodyText: @slavkap In case any failure in the ResizeVolumeCmd execution, the volume will still point to the new offering. So, better to update the new offering in the volume after ResizeVolumeCmd execution is successful.
timeline.author: sureshanaparti

replies.bodyText: thanks @sureshanaparti for the code review! I will move the update of new disk offerings after the resizeVolume, but maybe I need to move the method invocation of resizeVolumeWithNewOfferings before upgradeVMDb (like how it's invoked in upgradeStoppedVirtualMachine)?
replies.author: slavkap

timeline.message: change method name and move its invokation before VM DB update
